title: Возврату не подлежит
overview: What do the workers of a magic shop usually do? Find out from the animated sitcom about the fantasy and mystical adventures of its employees. The main roles are played by a successful realtor Platon, a talking painting of Prince Yaropolk Okayaninny, Rosa the gypsy, and the owner Victor. An inexhaustible stream of clients and Viktor's desire to earn extra money constantly sends the characters to all kinds of fabulous places: cursed houses, magical castles and bazaars, underground cities, and even in the past.
